title: OpenVu Watch Faces
summary: The best watch faces you can have! You can even play with them!
description: Tired of those boring watch faces? OpenVu displays the time in different cool and innovative ways! Use it on Normal and Ambient mode!Now you can change the colours of your OpenVu watch face as you like! Combine them and create awesome screens!You have 3 different watch faces plus a Pokemon watch face!========================================New Pokemon RPG Mode!! (new watch face)Battle each pokemon and defeat them to capture them! You can select them on your smartphone as your champion to fight other pokemons even on Ambient mode!Beware! Pokemons can escape! Be cautious! Every minute a new pokemon appears!Try to capture them all!!========================================Love those monsters? Have them on your wrist! Let them tell you the time.- All 151 monsters of the first generation.- Bored? Double tap to engage a fight! Defeat every opponent! (for Android Wear 1.3+)- Normal Mode- Ambient Mode supported- Round Layout supported- Square Layout supportedEvery minute a new battle begins! It's up to you to take control of them and battle your enemies!F.A.Q:- Why does my Tizen smartwatch not working? It's because OpenVu is developed for Android Wear devices. On Tizen you won't be able to send data from/to de smartwatch.- I can't send/receive data from/to my smartwatch: To send messages to the Wear device (such as to change the color or to select a pokemon) you must have both, the smartphone and the wear device connected and with both screens active.- I've already paid for this watch, why it's free now? I'm giving this watch face for free so more people can have it! If you want, you can send me your Order number and Order date to my email and I will gladly refund the previous purchase.
descriptionHTML:
Tired of those boring watch faces?

OpenVu displays the time in different cool and innovative ways! Use it on Normal and Ambient mode!

Now you can change the colours of your OpenVu watch face as you like! Combine them and create awesome screens!

You have 3 different watch faces plus a Pokemon watch face!

========================================
New Pokemon RPG Mode!! (new watch face)

Battle each pokemon and defeat them to capture them! You can select them on your smartphone as your champion to fight other pokemons even on Ambient mode!

Beware! Pokemons can escape! Be cautious! Every minute a new pokemon appears!

Try to capture them all!!

========================================
Love those monsters? Have them on your wrist! Let them tell you the time.

- All 151 monsters of the first generation.
- Bored? Double tap to engage a fight! Defeat every opponent! (for Android Wear 1.3+)
- Normal Mode
- Ambient Mode supported
- Round Layout supported
- Square Layout supported

Every minute a new battle begins! It's up to you to take control of them and battle your enemies!

F.A.Q:

- Why does my Tizen smartwatch not working? It's because OpenVu is developed for Android Wear devices. On Tizen you won't be able to send data from/to de smartwatch.

- I can't send/receive data from/to my smartwatch: To send messages to the Wear device (such as to change the color or to select a pokemon) you must have both, the smartphone and the wear device connected and with both screens active.

- I've already paid for this watch, why it's free now? I'm giving this watch face for free so more people can have it! If you want, you can send me your Order number and Order date to my email and I will gladly refund the previous purchase.
comments: No Tizen support can't get my Sony watch UPDATE Tried to send the watchface to a friends s2 gear with no luck. Attempted to select the pokemon then even changed some colors and still no luck after sent. The developer explained that the watch isn't android wear but tizen so sadly it won't work properly. But it also doesn't work with my new smart watch 3 by Sony. No watch faces to select or anything....I paid 2$ before this was free the creater did refund my money but I would like to see the 12 hour clock option as well
It works. . OK...one thing I have to say.... For the pokemon watchface... Can u also put the option to change it to the 12 hour format and not 24hr.... Plzzzzzzzzz
Pls let us switch pokemon on the watch itself Just rotate through them with a swipe or bottom tap or something would be enough
